official_title: A bill to authorize the District of Columbia Council to enact any act relating to the organization, jurisdiction, and rules of the landlord-tenant branch and the small claims and conciliation branch of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes the District of Columbia Council to enact any Act relating to the organization, jurisdiction, and rules of the landlord-tenant branch and the small claims and councilation branch of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.
